mapper.sql: hash, blocknumber, timestamp, nonce, blockhash, fromaddr, contractaddress, toaddr, valuecoin, tokenname, tokensymbol, tokendecimal, gaslimit, gasprice, gasused, status, tarhash, createtime,cid
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tx_logs
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tx_logs (hash, blocknumber, timestamp, nonce, blockhash, fromaddr, contractaddress, toaddr, valuecoin, tokenname, tokensymbol, tokendecimal, gaslimit, gasprice, gasused, status, tarhash, createtime,cid ) values (#{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blocknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nonce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokensymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokendecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gaslimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gasprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update tx_logs
hash = #{record.hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blocknumber = #{record.blocknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timestamp = #{record.timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nonce = #{record.nonce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blockhash = #{record.blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fromaddr = #{record.fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contractaddress = #{record.contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toaddr = #{record.toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

gaslimit = #{record.gaslimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

gasused = #{record.gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

tarhash = #{record.tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update tx_logs set hash = #{record.hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blocknumber = #{record.blocknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp = #{record.timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nonce = #{record.nonce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blockhash = #{record.blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromaddr = #{record.fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractaddress = #{record.contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toaddr = #{record.toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valuecoin = #{record.valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokenname = #{record.tokenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokensymbol = #{record.tokensymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokendecimal = #{record.tokendecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gaslimit = #{record.gaslimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gasprice = #{record.gasprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gasused = #{record.gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tarhash = #{record.tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tx_logs
blocknumber = #{blocknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nonce = #{nonce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fromaddr = #{fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contractaddress = #{contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toaddr = #{toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valuecoin = #{valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tokenname = #{tokenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tokensymbol = #{tokensymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tokendecimal = #{tokendecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gaslimit = #{gaslimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gasprice = #{gasprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gasused = #{gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tarhash = #{tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tx_logs set blocknumber = #{blocknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nonce = #{nonce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromaddr = #{fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractaddress = #{contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toaddr = #{toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valuecoin = #{valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokenname = #{tokenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokensymbol = #{tokensymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokendecimal = #{tokendecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gaslimit = #{gaslimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gasprice = #{gasprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gasused = #{gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tarhash = #{tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select toaddr,sum(valuecoin) as cpos from tx_logs where status=-1 group by toaddr
mapper.update: update tx_logs set status=0,tarhash = #{transcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where toaddr = #{toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
